japanese:
（水族館を見学し、
　この日の沖縄観光を終えた俺たちは――）
translation:
(After visiting the aquarium
 and finishing our Okinawa sightseeing for the day%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
（夕食に沖縄の海鮮づくしを堪能してから
　ホテルへと戻った）
translation:
(We enjoyed a seafood feast for dinner,
 and returned to the hotel.)

japanese:
（旅行も残り３日。
　いや、最終日は午前中の飛行機で帰るわけだし
　実質残り２日）
translation:
(We have three days left on our trip.
 Well, technically only two since
 we're flying back in the morning of the last day.)

japanese:
（この旅行で、四葉との仲は深まってはいる。
　ただ恋人らしいかと言えば……どうなんだろうな）
translation:
(My relationship with Yotsuba has deepened on this trip,
 but as for whether we're really
 acting like lovers... I'm not sure.)

japanese:
（実際、今日だってチャンスはあった。
　あったが……やっぱ微妙だよなぁ）
translation:
(Actually, I had a chance today.
 But...it was kind of awkward.)

japanese:
（はあ……。
　結局は成果なしってことか）
translation:
(Ugh...
 Looks like I'm not making any progress after all.)

japanese:
（このままじゃ、俺から四葉にキスするなんて
　夢のまた夢だ……）
translation:
(At this rate, is kissing Yotsuba
 just a pipe dream from me...?)

japanese:
（うん？
　こんな時間に誰だ？　らいはか？）
translation:
(Hmm?
 Who is it at this hour? Raiha?)

japanese:
フー君、私だけど。
少し時間いい？
translation:
It's me, Fu-kun.
You have a moment?

japanese: 二乃……？
translation: Nino...?

japanese: 私もいる。
translation: I'm here too.

japanese:
ああ、いま開ける。
ちょっと待ってくれ。
translation:
Okay, I'll open the door.
Hold up.

japanese: お邪魔します。
translation: Excuse us.

japanese: こんばんは、フー君。
translation: Good evening, Fu-kun.

japanese: お前ら、またかよ。
translation: You two again?

japanese: え？　またかって？
translation: Huh? What do you mean, again?

japanese:
今日のことだよ。
妙な行動ばっかしやがって。
translation:
About what happened today.
You guys were acting really strange.

japanese: 妙な行動？
translation: Strange? What do you mean?

japanese:
とぼけんな。
２人とも身に覚えがあるだろ？
やけに俺に絡んできやがって。
translation:
Don't play dumb. You both know what you did.
You were all over me for some reason.

japanese: だからそれは、フータローの自意識過剰。
translation: That's just your own paranoia, Futaro.

japanese:
とぼけるなと言ったよな？
遠回しなことをしてないで、
俺に言いたいことがあるのならここで言え。
translation:
Don't act like you don't know what I'm talking about.
If you have something to say to me,
just say it straight.

japanese:
ふーん。
いいわ、じゃあ言わせてもらうわね。
translation:
Hmmm.
Fine then. I'll say it.

japanese: フー君は四葉のことをどう思ってるのかしら。
translation: What do you really think of Yotsuba, Fu-kun?
Whaaa...?

japanese: 四葉のこと、本当に好き？
translation: Do you really love her?

japanese:
な、なんだよ今更。
当然だろ……。
translation:
Wh-why did you wait until NOW to ask me that?
Isn't it obvious...

japanese:
だったら、どうして
もっと恋人らしいことをしないのよ。
translation: Then why don't you act more like a couple with her?

japanese: うぐっ！？
translation: Ugh?!

japanese: 半年前から２人、ほとんど変わってない。
translation:
You two haven't really changed
much over the past half year.

japanese:
それは俺だって気にしてたが……。
受験もあったわけだし、お前らを全員揃って
卒業させるのが俺の役割でもあったわけだし……。
translation:
That's something I was worried about too...
With the entrance exams coming up, it was also my
role to ensure that all of you graduated together...

japanese:
受験が大変だったのはわかるわ。
自分の勉強だってあるのに、
四葉や五月の面倒をみてくれてたことも。
translation:
I understand that the entrance exams were tough.
You were also taking care of Yotsuba and Itsuki
while studying for yourself.

japanese:
そ、そうだよな！
本当に大変だったんだぞ？
translation:
Th-that's true!
It was really tough, you know?

japanese: でも、それとこれとは別問題。
translation: But, this is a separate issue.

japanese: うっ……。
translation: Ooh...

japanese:
私なら、こうして旅行に来たら
もっとフータローと２人っきりになりたい。
translation:
If I were in Yotsuba's position,
I would want to spend more time alone
with you on this trip, Futaro.

japanese: それなのにフータローと四葉は……。
translation: And yet, you and Yotsuba are still...

japanese: もちろん四葉も四葉だけど。
translation: Although, Yotsuba IS Yotsuba.

japanese:
いや、待て待て待て！
お前ら、話をずらそうとしてないか？
translation:
Woah, wait wait wait!
Are you guys trying to change the subject?

japanese:
俺が四葉のことを好きかどうかと、
お前らの妙な行動になんの関係があるんだよ！
translation:
What does your weird behavior lately have to do
with whether or not I like Yotsuba!

japanese:
関係大ありよ。
私たちは、四葉をたき付けるために
フー君にアプローチしてたんだから。
translation:
It has a lot to do with it.
We were trying to get close to you, Fu-kun,
to get Yotsuba fired up.
Whaaa...?

japanese:
フータローと四葉のために、心を鬼にしてやってた。
四葉が本気で焦らないとダメだから、こっちも本気で。
translation:
We were toughening her heart up for both of
your sakes. We needed Yotsuba to get serious,
so we had to get serious too.

japanese: そういうことかよ……。
translation: So that's what was happening...

japanese: でも、効果はあったはず。
translation: But, I'm sure there was an effect.

japanese:
フー君は、今日の四葉を見て
なにか感じるところはないの？
translation:
Fu-kun, did you feel anything
after seeing Yotsuba today?

japanese: それは……。
translation: Well...

japanese:
（昼間、四葉が急に俺に抱きついてきた時、
　あいつは妙に必死だった）
translation:
(When Yotsuba suddenly hugged me during the day,
 she seemed strangely desperate.)

japanese:
（水族館で腕を組むのに失敗した時は、
　ずいぶんとガッカリしていた）
translation:
(When we failed to link arms at the aquarium,
 she was quite disappointed.)

japanese: （思い起こせば、他にも心当たりがいくつかある）
translation:
(Now that I think about it,
 there are several other things I remember.)

japanese:
（四葉のほうは
　もうとっくに変わろうとしてたのに
　俺はそれを感じ取れず、いつもと同じように……）
translation:
(Yotsuba has been trying to change for a while now,
 but I didn't notice it
 and treated her the same way as always...)

japanese:
（そう考えれば一花や五月、
　それにらいはの妙な言動も納得がいく）
translation:
(If I think about it that way,
 I can understand the strange behavior
 of Ichika, Itsuki, and Raiha.)

japanese: その顔、やっとわかったみたいね。
translation:
That face, it seems that you've finally grasped
the situation.

japanese:
……おう。
心配かけちまって悪かった。
translation:
...Ahh.
Sorry for worrying you.

japanese:
まったく、本当よ。
手間がかかって仕方ないわ。
translation:
Yeah, seriously! You guys really were
being a pain.

japanese: 二乃……。
translation: Nino...

japanese:
けど、あとはもう知らないから。
ここから先、あんたたちがそれでも
私を納得させないのなら――
translation:
But, that's all I can do for now.
If you guys can't convince me of
your love from here on out%p-2;――

japanese:
こっちにも考えがあるわ。
わかってるわよね、フー君？
translation:
I've got the perfect person in mind for you.
You get it, right, Fu-kun?

japanese: ああ。
translation: Yeah.

japanese:
それに、お前たちのおかげで
四葉の気持ちに気づけた。
translation: Thanks to you guys, I realized Yotsuba's feelings.

japanese: 四葉の気持ち？
translation: Yotsuba's feelings?

japanese:
要は俺が甘えてたってことだ。
責任は全部、俺にある。
translation:
In other words, I was being too dependent on her.
It's all my responsibility.

japanese:
だから残りの旅行のあいだで、
四葉を安心させるし、お前らも納得させる。
translation:
So during the rest of the trip,
I'll make Yotsuba feel at ease,
and convince you guys too.

japanese: その……俺たちが、恋人同士なんだってな。
translation: I mean...we're supposed to be a couple.

japanese: ……ま、頑張りなさい。
translation: Well, do your best, then.

japanese: ちゃんと見てるから。
translation: We're watching.

japanese: ん？　なんの音だ？
translation: Hm? What was that sound?

japanese: 私のスマホだわ。
translation: It's my phone.

japanese:
私も。
ちょっと待って、フータロー。
translation:
Mine too.
Wait a second, Futaro.

japanese: はあっ！　嘘でしょ！？
translation: What?! Are you kidding me?!

japanese: なんで……。
translation: Why...?

japanese:
おい、なんだよ。
なにかあったのか？
translation: Hey, what's going on? Did something happen?

japanese: お父さんが……。
translation: Our dad...

japanese: 沖縄に来てるって。
translation: He's in Okinawa, apparently.
...Whaaa?
